```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(SingleCellExperiment)
  library(scDblFinder)
  library(PRROC)
  library(BiocParallel)
})
source("../misc.R")
```

We load the datasets:

```{r}
lf <- list.files("../benchmark/datasets/", pattern="rds$", full=TRUE)
names(lf) <- gsub("\\.rds$","", basename(lf))
ll <- lapply(lf, FUN=function(x){
  x <- readRDS(x)
  sce <- SingleCellExperiment(list(counts=x[[1]]))
  sce$truth <- x[[2]]
  sce
})
```

# Features

```{r, cache=TRUE}
features <- c("weighted","distanceToNearest","distanceToNearestDoublet",
              "distanceToNearestReal","difficulty","expected",
              "observed","lsizes","nfeatures","cxds_score","nearestClass")
featsMin1 <- lapply(seq_along(features), FUN=function(i) features[-i])
res <- runParams(ll, list(trainingFeatures=featsMin1), BPPARAM=MulticoreParam(3))
res$excluded <- sapply(strsplit(res$trainingFeatures,", "), FUN=function(x) setdiff(features,x))
saveRDS(res, file="optims_features.rds")
```

# Marker correlation

```{r, cache=TRUE}
res <- runParams(ll, list(clustCor=list(NULL,10,20,50,Inf)), BPPARAM=MulticoreParam(3))
saveRDS(res, file="optims_clustCor.rds")
```


# Random vs intra-cluster doublets

```{r, cache=TRUE}
res <- runParams(ll, list(propRandom=list(0,0.25,1)), BPPARAM=MulticoreParam(3))
saveRDS(res, file="optims_propRandom.rds")
```

# Number of iterations

```{r, cache=TRUE}
res <- runParams(ll, list(iter=as.list(1:4)), BPPARAM=MulticoreParam(4))
saveRDS(res, file="optims_iter.rds")
```

# Hyper-parameters

```{r, cache=TRUE}
pars <- list( nrounds=list(NULL, 0.25, 1, 5, 10, 20), max_depth=as.list(4:7) )
res <- runParams(ll, pars, BPPARAM=MulticoreParam(4))
saveRDS(res, file="optims_hyperparams.rds")
```

# Including PCs

```{r, cache=TRUE}
res <- runParams(ll, list(includePCs=list(c(),1:3,1:5,1:10,1:20)), BPPARAM=MulticoreParam(4))
saveRDS(res, file="optims_PCs.rds")
```

# Pre-processing

```{r, cache=TRUE}
res <- runParams(ll, list(processing=list("default","rawFeatures","normFeatures","rawPCA")), BPPARAM=MulticoreParam(4))
```
